continuum.commenet: Extend lifecycle beyond end-state for engineering governance
continuum.reference: Activate only after end.xml archives the canonical bundle.

xml-engineering.guideline: Snapshot every structural hash from end.xml to `control-plane/checksums/checksum` so drift becomes observable.
Promote interface contracts into the service mesh registry below to orchestrate downstream consumers.
Keep heuristics deterministic by binding all random seeds in `simulation/parameters`.

policies.policy: Cap mutation retries at 3 to avoid oscillating handoffs.
Route inconsistent nodes to the quarantine topic for manual inspection.

scenarios.scenario: Validate recovery by rewinding to begin.xml state.
Project schema evolution for two future releases.

handoff.step: Lock configuration hashes and publish them to the registry.
Emit release notification to dependent pipelines.
Run telemetry watchers for 24h to validate stability.
